data.actual_result: It jumps to the closest block of chat history, not the pinned message
data.expected_result: You jump to the pinned message
data.short_description: Jumping to pinned when there are messages unread jumps back to where you were
data.steps_to_repro: - Have people send messages in a channel, as many as possible so they get outside of your Render range - Try to jump to a pinned message outside of the current chat history (meaning outside of the "load more messages" range) - Observe as it jumps back to a chat history before the pinned message ("a chat history" means a block between the bottom "load more messages" and the top "load more messages") - If it doesn't work, please try a few more times.
